Smart Microwave Oven: A microwave oven that can learn from your usage patterns and adjust its cooking time and power accordingly, resulting in more efficient and effective cooking.
Microwave Oven with Voice Control: A microwave oven that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing you to easily cook food without having to touch any buttons.
Microwave Oven with a Built-in Camera: A microwave oven that has a built-in camera, allowing you to monitor the cooking process and adjust the cooking time and power accordingly.
Microwave Oven with a Self-Cleaning Function: A microwave oven that has a self-cleaning function, eliminating the need for manual cleaning and making it more hygienic.
Microwave Oven with a Built-in Food Sensor: A microwave oven that has a built-in food sensor, allowing it to automatically adjust the cooking time and power based on the type of food being cooked.
